apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji on Apple devices showcases a woman leaning in with her eyes closed and lips puckered, her light to medium skin tone rendered with Appleâ€™s characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The soft rounded edges of her face and hair, combined with a subtle blush, create an intimate and tender visual. This emoji on Apple devices is a sweet and affectionate way to convey love, romance, or a fond farewell, adding a personal touch to messages.
